tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was Dr. Aneeta Talwar's patient twice. One was back in September 2021 where I was diagnosed with a large fibroid of about 15-20cm and I had to undergo myomectomy. While all other doctors, I consulted for second third opinions literally freaked out looking a the size of the fibroid, Dr. Talwar was confident that it can be treated well and I am happy to say that she did an amazing job. Explained all the possible precautions and risks very well. The second time I went to see her was for my pregnancy. I delivered a baby in 2024. My experience for those 38 weeks was nothing but phenomenal.  It was a high risk pregnancy and she did her best to be ahead of those risks.She is very efficient at her job and does whatever is the best treatment for her patients. The best part about consulting her is that she won't sugar-coat situations. Instead she will be straightforward, practical and objective in her treatment. I am really thankful to her for the kind of emotional support she provided me during my delivery and myomectomy in the OT. She is an amazing and wonderful doctor. Thank you Dr. Aneeta Talwar for being so objective, detailed, practical, result oriented and thorough.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
**** ************* **** **** **** **** **** ************* *** ** truly passionate about helping the patients. Dr. Aneeta Talwar listens patiently, reviews your profile in detail, will advise only necessary tests, and share her recommended treatment. Her recommendation has always worked the best for me. 
I went through an open myomectomy in 2017. It was a major 3.5 hours surgery. The surgery went very well without any complications and medication was also completed within a week of discharge. In 2019, I delivered a baby in a different location through c-section. My gynaecologist here said, “Myomectomy was done excellently. One couldn’t see and tell that such a major surgery had been performed as the scars were minimal during the previous surgery or healed very well.” She went on to say that she had never seen such an exceptional surgical work and the complications she was expecting didn’t occur due to this. 

I am so glad to have been initially referred to Dr. Aneeta - it was a blessing as it not only resolved the earlier issue but also prevented any long-term complications.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Encountered rude doctor; found caring one later. ** ******** ********* **************** ** ****** ***** I had never encountered a rude doctor until this experience. It was my first time seeking consultation with a gynaecologist, as I wanted to begin planning. Having undergone an open myomectomy a year ago due to fibroids, I expected the doctor to review my discharge summary or previous reports and provide appropriate advice. However, she merely suggested trying to conceive for three to four months before returning if unsuccessful.************* **** ********** * *** ************** *** *********** ********** ***** ** ****** *** ********* ** ** ****** *** ********* ****** ***** ** ******* ** **** *********** ********* *** **** ******** ** *** ************* ********** ******** ** ** ********* ***** ***** *** ********* ***** ** ******** *** ******* *************** ******* ** ******* **** ********** ** ** ***** ******** **** ******* * ********* ****** ************** *** ** *********** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ***** *** ** ***** ** * ******* *** *** ** ******* ****** ** ****** **** For my first visit I had to wait for 2 hours and when she heard my problems and did a test she just made a very serious face ** ** * ** ***** *** **** *** ***** where as after my scan report when I met her again instead of explaining things and the logical explanation of her suggestion, she directly rejected my point of view. ******* *** *** ** ********** ** ********* *** ****** ****** ** *** *** ******* * *** ******* **** **** never ever going to see her in my life

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Aneeta mam is awesome, she gives time, suggestions, very friendly, more than tablets she suggeste to eat healthy things.
I consulted many doctors, no one is like her.
Always smile on face, she explains things very nicely. Always I used to feel relaxed after meeting her.There are many positive things about her..we just love her....

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First off madam went to take a tea break which was dragged till an hour and all her pregnant patients including other OPDs like me had to wait for hour + for doctor to get back @ chamber. Moreover I felt madam was more interested to “judge” me for how I get the disease than actually helping me. After the full course of her prescribed med , I still had the same problem n I decided to go for a different practitioner *** ** ***** ********* ****** ** ** ******** ** ****** *** * ******* ** ** **** * *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very patient, listening to all of the health concerns I mentioned. She understands the symptoms and other concerns that we are trying to explain to her. Dr made sure I get the best treatment possible.  I had to undergo a surgery and Dr had explained in detail why the surgery is required and what is the plan. This made me and my family to be aware of the condition and get mentally prepared and thus the surgery went well. All the post surgery lifestyle modifications and other advises was given properly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Awesome experience with Dr Aneeta. Truly exceeded our expectation in whole pregnancy cycle. Highly recommended for any OBGYN.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: she treats patients with lots of dedication. To the point. No unnecessary talk. Satisfied  with treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Aneeta is so friendly with patients and always maintain smile on her face during consultations and suggest healthy stuff rather than lot of medicines. Doctor is very practical :)
